Tender Description: The BEAUFORT WEST MUNICIPALITY hereby invites service providers to submit formal quotations for SUPPLY AND DELIVERY OF TOOLS AND EQUIPMENT for EPWP workers of Beaufort West, Murraysburg, Nelspoort and Merweville.

The Beaufort West Municipality Hereby invites Contractors to submit bids for the design, supply and installation of mechanical & electrical works for the upgrading of the Beaufort West wastewater treatment works.
Formal quotations are invited by the Municipal Manager of the BEAUFORT WEST Municipality for the Supply and Delivery of Material and Equipment for Needlework project.
Formal quotations are invited by the Acting Municipal Manager of the BEAUFORT WEST Municipality for the Supply and Delivery of Bakery Equipment

The Beaufort West Municipality hereby invites service providers for the supply, delivery, installation or maintenance of an A4 folding & pressure sealer machine with a touch screen display for a period of 3 years.

The BEAUFORT WEST MUNICIPALITY hereby invites electrical contractors to submit competitive bid for the supply, deliver, installation, refurbishment, relocation, testing and commissioning of various primary & secondary substations with associated equipment and works required for Beaufort West Municipality for 3 year period.
